description: This file defines API routes for starting and stopping music streaming sessions using FastAPI. It includes route handlers that interact with streaming services and database dependencies, and manages authentication and response handling.

methods.name: start_stream
methods.description: Handles POST requests to start a streaming session for an authenticated user, returning session details or raising HTTP exceptions on errors.

methods.name: stop_stream
methods.description: Handles POST requests to stop a streaming session for an authenticated user, returning a status message or raising HTTP exceptions on errors.
